# ECHILD How To Guides {.unnumbered}

Welcome to the ECHILD How To Guides!

Here you will eventually find a series of guides that will help you extract and manage data in ECHILD, along with full example scripts.

Please bear with us while we get things up and running.

For any queries, please contact [Matthew Jay](mailto:matthew.jay@ucl.ac.uk).

# ECHILD

ECHILD is [Education and Child Health Insights from Linked Data](https://www.echild.ac.uk){target="_blank"}, which links the National Pupil Database and Hospital Episode Statistics plus other relevant datasets) for all of England.
